text: O n be ninu awon yehudi, awon t’o n yi oro pada kuro ni awon aye re, won si n wi pe: “A gbo, a si yapa. Gbo, a o gba tire. Omugo wa.” Won n fi ahon won yi oro sodi ati pe won n bu enu-ate lu esin. ti o ba je pe won so pe: “A gbo, a si tele e. Gbo, ki o si kiye si wa”, iba dara fun won, iba si tona julo. Sugbon Allahu fi won gegun-un nitori aigbagbo won. Nitori naa, won ko nii gbagbo afi die (ninu won)
